title: What is a drone Hunter? - Quora

response.answer_text: Autonomous Drone Remediation. Fortem DroneHunter™ is a fully autonomous intelligent (robotic) aircraft. Enabled with Fortem TrueView™ radar designed and engineered for physical remediation of intruder or threatening drones, DroneHunter is designed to quickly detect, classify, and secure against drones and other UAS.
